name: Invite a Kantree project members from a new rows in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
Every time you add a new row to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will automatically invite member to a selected project in Kantree.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses this [worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!Au92ZQn17jiNswlyDTNAR5DMPXF-?e=ZzAZRL).
